name: AS Performance Gear VS FE 75W-80 GL4-5
description: AS Performance Gear VS FE 75W-80 GL4-5 is a fully synthetic high-performance manual transmission oil. It is suitable for use in modern passenger cars with manual transmissions. Thanks to the low viscosity class, fuel consumption is reduced while shifting is comfortable at the same time. Caution: Not suitable for use in stepped automatic transmissions, in DCT/DSG (double clutch) or CVT (continuously variable automatic) transmissions.
